00054 typedef struct __rt_mutex {
00055 
00056         unsigned magic;         /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00057 
00058         xnsynch_t synch_base;   /* !< Base synchronization object. */
00059 
00060         xnhandle_t handle;      /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00061 
00062         int lockcnt;            /* !< Lock nesting level (> 0 means "locked"). */
00063         
00064         char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* !< Symbolic name. */
00065 
00066 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE
00067         pid_t cpid;             /* !< Creator's pid. */
00068 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00069 
00070         xnholder_t rlink;       /* !< Link in resource queue. */
00071 
00072 #define rlink2mutex(ln)         container_of(ln, RT_MUTEX, rlink)
00073 
00074     xnqueue_t *rqueue;          /* !< Backpointer to resource queue. */
00075 
00076 } RT_MUTEX;
